doc.description:
Specific configuration for Matek F405 WMN board.
Main board devices: - IMU ICM42688-P (InvenSense V3) : needs a sensor to body calibration (inverse X and Z axes) - Baro (SPL06-001) - OSD (AT7456E) : desactivated for rovers.
Example of use in the "gvf_cbf_steering_rove.xml" airframe file.
